Resources for ICS Families Teaching in the languages of our community: English, español, and Português Welcome to ICS We encourage families to partner with us in providing their children with the highest quality opportunities for academic and social development. We strongly value the rich and varied backgrounds and perspectives that each of our families brings …

div.script: function doGTranslate(lang_pair) {if(lang_pair.value)lang_pair=lang_pair.value;if(lang_pair=='')return;var lang=lang_pair.split('|')[1];if(typeof _gaq!='undefined'){_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'GTranslate', lang, location.pathname+location.search]);}else {if(typeof ga!='undefined')ga('send', 'event', 'GTranslate', lang, location.pathname+location.search);}var plang=location.pathname.split('/')[1];if(plang.length !=2 && plang != 'zh-CN' && plang != 'zh-TW' && plang != 'hmn' && plang != 'haw' && plang != 'ceb')plang='en';if(lang == 'en')location.href=location.protocol+'//'+location.host+gt_request_uri;else location.href=location.protocol+'//'+location.host+'/'+lang+gt_request_uri;}

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-a6fbcef animated-fast elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-7d7f3fa4 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: We encourage families to partner with us in providing their children with the highest quality opportunities for academic and social development. We strongly value the rich and varied backgrounds and perspectives that each of our families brings to our school community.

p.span: For information and resources regarding your child’s physical or health, visit Health Services or Social and Emotional Learning.
If you can’t find what you’re looking for here, please call ICS at 401-721-0824 for assistance.
Google Classroom guides for parents are available on the
page in English, Spanish, and Portuguese.

div.p: If you need support with technology or anything else, please email familysupport@internationalcharterschool.org.
During the COVID-19 school closure, we are serving drive-up meals from 12–1 p.m. Monday-Friday at ICS.

ul.li: Hot lunch is served every day.
Brown bag breakfast is available for the following day.
Drive-up service is on the Tower St. side of ICS.
